Title: A Fixer of Sorts
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), Justin Britt-Gibson
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: Nola and Burton have a bloody confrontation. Tommy defies Chayton's orders and attacks Proctor's club. Hood's secret is threatened when a FBI agent shows up at his door, as someone close to him discovers the truth.
